name: Sample Cisco IOS/IOSXE - Custom Fields
description: This Audit example shows how a Custom Field can be used for auditing dynamic values in each device

rules.name: SNMP Location
rules.description: When using a Custom Field (Settings > Custom Fields), the variable used here will dynamically use the value of the populated field for each device

rules.name: Hostname
rules.description: When using a Custom Field (Settings > Custom Fields), the variable used here will dynamically use the value of the populated field for each device
